name: The Island 2! [ New Update! ]
description:
Controls!

- Menu Is [ ESC Key ]

- Interacting/Talking is [ Enter Key ] 

Info:

5 Levels Will Be Granted After You Complete The Game Which Will Take Approximately 2 Minutes To Level Up you need 50 Levels! If you Play This Game and Enjoy it Check out My tiktok Where I Take Suggestions To Make  RPG Games Just Like This.

Instructions:

1. Download The Game "Island 2"

2. You Should See A Blue Ice Cube/Cube

3. Open It and A Folder Called "Island 2" Should Pop up 

4. Open The Folder.

5. Open Game.exe Nothing Else 

6. The Other Files are assets and Game Saves!

7. Don't Mess With Them You Only Have 4 Slots!

Thanks And 1 More thing

Mods:

There are Mods for The Game But Just Remember Don't Create Mods So before You Put Something In The Game Files Make Sure Its not a Hack/Glitch.

Thanks For Playing My Game!
